Lyric:
[00:17.460]Oh her eyes' her eyes
[00:19.530]Make the stars look like they're not shining
[00:22.180]Her hair' her hair
[00:23.900]Falls perfectly without her trying
[00:26.780]She's so beautiful
[00:29.450]And I tell her every day
[00:34.520]Yeah I know' I know
[00:37.040]When I compliment her
[00:38.400]She wont believe me
[00:39.790]And its so' its so
[00:41.440]Sad to think she don't see what I see
[00:44.330]But every time she asks me do I look okay
[00:47.910]I say
[00:51.090]When I see your face
[00:55.770]There's not a thing that I would change
[01:00.490]Cause you're amazing
[01:03.610]Just the way you are
[01:09.260]And when you smile'
[01:13.390]The whole world stops and stares for awhile
[01:17.990]Cause girl you're amazing
[01:21.190]Just the way you are
[01:28.420]Her lips, her lips
[01:30.080]I could kiss them all day if she'd let me
[01:32.640]Her laugh' her laugh
[01:34.370]She hates but I think its so sexy
[01:37.150]She's so beautiful
[01:39.500]And I tell her every day
[01:44.910]Oh you know' you know' you know
[01:47.300]Id never ask you to change
[01:49.780]If perfect is what you're searching for
[01:52.000]Then just stay the same
[01:54.310]So don't even bother asking
[01:56.660]If you look okay
[01:58.350]You know I say
[02:01.850]When I see your face
[02:06.310]There's not a thing that I would change
[02:10.920]Cause you're amazing
[02:14.100]Just the way you are
[02:19.470]And when you smile'
[02:23.890]The whole world stops and stares for awhile
[02:28.340]Cause girl you're amazing
[02:31.620]Just the way you are
[02:36.840]The way you are
[02:41.270]The way you are
[02:46.110]Girl you're amazing
[02:49.410]Just the way you are
[02:54.470]When I see your face
[02:58.980]There's not a thing that I would change
[03:03.870]Cause you're amazing
[03:07.100]Just the way you are
[03:12.130]And when you smile'
[03:16.710]The whole world stops and stares for awhile
[03:21.280]Cause girl you're amazing
[03:24.710]Just the way you are
